metadata.title: CVE-2017-17498 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: WritePNMImage in coders/pnm.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (bit_stream.cMagickBitStreamMSBWrite heap-based buffer overflow and application crash)or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
